mapper.sql: t_comp_aptitude.id as compAptitudeId, t_comp_aptitude.comp_id as compAptitudeCompId, t_comp_aptitude.certificate_num as compAptitudeCertificateNum, t_comp_aptitude.certificate_detail as compAptitudeCertificateDetail, t_comp_aptitude.version as compAptitudeVersion, t_comp_aptitude.create_time as compAptitudeCreateTime, t_comp_aptitude.update_time as compAptitudeUpdateTime, t_comp_aptitude.is_active as compAptitudeIsActive, t_company.comp_type as companyCompType, t_company.industry_type as companyIndustryType, t_company.comp_name as companyCompName, t_comp_builder.id as compBuilderId, t_comp_builder.comp_id as compBuilderCompId, t_comp_builder.name as compBuilderName, t_comp_builder.gender as compBuilderGender, t_comp_builder.reg_num as compBuilderRegNum, t_comp_builder.major_level as compBuilderMajorLevel, t_comp_builder.version as compBuilderVersion, t_comp_builder.create_time as compBuilderCreateTime, t_comp_builder.update_time as compBuilderUpdateTime, t_comp_builder.is_active as compBuilderIsActive
mapper.select:
select
from t_company, t_comp_builder where t_comp_builder.id = #{id} and t_comp_builder.comp_id = t_company.id

select
from t_company, t_comp_builder where t_comp_builder.comp_id = t_company.id order by t_comp_builder.update_time desc, t_comp_builder.create_time desc

select
from t_company, t_comp_builder
order by
${query.sortColumn} ${query.sortOrder}
t_comp_builder.update_time desc, t_comp_builder.create_time desc
